emerging_technologies.name: General-Purpose Autonomous Agents
emerging_technologies.description: Agents capable of performing a wide array of tasks with minimal human input, adapting to new environments and user needs.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Redefines labor markets, increases productivity, and potentially decreases job availability in certain sectors. Ethical concerns about autonomy and decision-making arise.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High initial cost, need for regulatory frameworks, cultural acceptance of AI in daily life, and the development of trust in AI decision-making.

emerging_technologies.name: Collaborative Multi-Agent Systems
emerging_technologies.description: Systems where multiple agents work together to achieve complex objectives, enhancing efficiency and decision-making.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances urban planning, logistics, and emergency response. However, concerns about privacy and data security grow due to increased interconnectivity.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires interoperability standards, robust cybersecurity measures, and public trust in networked AI systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Ethical Decision-Making Agents
emerging_technologies.description: Agents designed to make decisions based on ethical frameworks, ensuring AI actions align with human values.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Addresses concerns about AI's ethical decision-making, but also brings up debates on what constitutes ethical behavior.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cultural and philosophical acceptance, regulatory acceptance, and the development of universally accepted ethical standards.

emerging_technologies.name: Agent Specialization for Industry
emerging_technologies.description: Agents tailored for specific industrial applications, optimizing processes and resource management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Boosts efficiency and productivity, but may lead to job displacement in specialized roles.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Industry readiness, cost-effectiveness, and the ability to demonstrate clear ROI.

emerging_technologies.name: Agent-Human Symbiosis
emerging_technologies.description: Agents that integrate seamlessly with human cognitive and emotional processes, enhancing human capabilities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances human performance but raises questions about privacy, identity, and the ethics of enhancement.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Public acceptance, regulatory frameworks for human augmentation, and technological feasibility.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Electric Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Vehicles capable of self-driving with electric power, significantly reducing human error and pollution.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Increasingly adopted in urban environments, regulatory acceptance, and widespread public use.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Driven Predictive Maintenance
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that predict when machinery requires maintenance, reducing downtime and operational costs.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Integrated into various industries, with high acceptance in manufacturing and transportation sectors.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Home Automation
mainstream_technologies.description: AI agents manage home environments, optimizing energy use and enhancing security.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Common in new housing developments, with growing retrofitting in older homes.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards AI systems that not only assist but operate autonomously and integrate deeply with human activities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Transforms daily life, work, and social interactions. Raises ethical, privacy, and identity issues.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI governance, human augmentation, and ethical AI frameworks.

epoch_themes.description: Industries evolve with AI agents tailored to specific needs, enhancing productivity and innovation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Alters job markets, increases efficiency, but also displaces traditional roles.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Industry-specific AI applications become standard, driving sector-specific innovation and competition.
